sayimata boho durata wayasa wisi gananak wannata atha.ohu 'thalelu' yana warnaye kalu pahayata wadath nambauru samak himikaragena sitiyeya.ohuge sruju kes tharamak digata wawi thibu athara ehi kisima piliwelak thibune natha.dina gananakin nokapu rawulak ohu sathuwa thibu athara eya mangin ohuta wayasata wada penumak laba di thibuni.nil paha kotu kotu kamisayakin ha 'kama' kota kalisamakin sarasi siti hethema depayata kalu paha bola bola sahitha rabar sereppu kuttamak palanda sitiyeya.ohu 'kandela' sigarattuwak bomin siti athara lekhakaya wethatada ema sigarattuwak pirinamu wita lekhakaya thama akriya dumpanaya karannek pamanak bawa kiya eya prathikshepa kaleya.sayima me awasthawe ithamath nosansun bawa lekhakaya wataha gaththe thathpara pahen pahata sigarattuwe alu kadamin siti bawini.tharamaka pushtimath sirurak thibu sayima karamin siti rakiyawa kumakdayi kiya lekhakaya kalpana kaleya.
